name: Cat Run Leo 2
description:
Cat Run Leo 2 is a free cat runner game with different running themes. Choose your favorite cat and dash your way in the different cities. Run, dodge, jump, and slide into an incredible chasing adventure.

While running, avoid hitting trucks, cars, buses or any other object that could either slow you down or stop you. Collect all the gold coins and the fun power ups to get further and to give the tireless dog the slip. Start your way, run as fast as you can to escape from Tom the angry dog.

Cat Run Leo 2 is one of the most exciting and free running games! If you love running games or cat games, then you will love the free and cool Cat Run Leo 2 game. Try it out and download Cat Run Leo 2 now!

How to play:
- Drag/swipe to jump or slide and to move left or right
- The power ups are activated automatically when you get them
- Buy new characters and upgrade power ups with the collected gold coins
- Try to dash so fast that you can smash the sonic wall ;-)

Features:
- Different cats including the talking star Cat Leo and Lea the princess cat as ninja cat
- 2 run play mode: levels and infinite
- Cartoon like environment with Leo Catomy
- Amazing power-ups: gold coin magnet, rocket, go kart, etc.
- Trucks, cars and buses to avoid!
- Lots of obstacles to dodge
- Cool music

If you like Cat Run Leo 2, please rate it with 5 stars on the store and invite your friends to join the pet race. Download Cat Run Leo 2 now!
